nodes.text: The Senate Unification Preparations Committee was a Galactic Alliance Senate committe whose purpose was to organize the preparations for the Unification Summit, a series of negotiations in an attempt to unite the Galactic Federation of Free Alliances, the Confederation, and the Imperial Remnant. The committee was headed by Bothan Galactic Alliance Senator Tiurrg Drey'lye.
In 43 ABY, Drey'lye, escorted by Jedi Knight Jaina Solo, met with Imperial Remnant Head of State Jagged Fel in a preliminary meeting aboard the Star Destroyer Gilad Pellaeon.
